tuv.seg: Credit history - the Irish Credit Bureau
Stair chreidmheasa - Biúró Creidmheasa na hÉireann
The Irish Credit Bureau (ICB) is the biggest credit-referencing agency in Ireland
Is é Biúró Creidmheasa na hÉireann (BCÉ) an ghníomhaireacht is mó tagairt creidmheasa in Éirinn
Local authorities are also members
Comhlacht prímháideach atá ann
Membership does not include utility companies or retail outlets
Is leis na baill é agus is iad a dhéanann é a mhaoiniú
The ICB maintains a database of information on the performance of credit agreements, such as mortgages; car loans; other personal loans; leasing agreements; hire purchase agreements and credit cards

Déanann BCÉ faisnéis a chothabháil maidir le feidhmíocht chomhaontuithe creidmheasa idir iasachtaithe agus institiúid airgeadais. San áireamh i gcomhaontuithe creidmheasa tá morgáistí; iasachtaí cairr agus pearsanta; comhaontuithe leasa; ceannach ar chíos agus cártaí creidmheasa
It does not monitor overdraft agreements, with the exception of overdraft agreements that are the subject of legal proceedings
Ní dhéanann BCÉ monatóireacht ar chomhaontuithe rótharraingte ach amháin sa chás go bhfuil cás cúirte i gceist maidir le rótharraingt
Lenders usually send information to the ICB on a monthly basis
Seolann na h-institiúidí iasachta faisnéis chuig BCÉ go míosúil, go hiondúil
Each time you apply for credit from an ICB member, they can access your credit file to check your performance

Gach uair a dhéanann tú iarratas ar chreidmheas ó bhall BCÉ, breathnaíonn an institiúid sin ar an dtaifead creidmheasa a bhaineann leat le fáil amach cén chaoi ar éirigh leat cheana in aon chomhaontú creidmheasa a bhí agat
Typically, your repayment history over a 24-month period is included in this credit report, including where you may have missed payments
Beidh stair d'aisíocaíochtaí le 24 mhí anuas ar an dtaifead, babhtaí gur theip ort íocaíocht a dhéanamh san áireamh
The lender can ask the ICB for a credit score or credit rating, calculated on the basis of your credit history
Féadfaidh an t-iasachtóir grádú creidmheasa a éileamh ó BCÉ, a ríomhtar ar bhun do thaifid chreidmheasa
If you have come to an agreement with your lender to postpone repayments, this will not affect your credit rating
Má dhéanann tú socrú leis an iasachtóir íocaíochtaí a chur ar athló, ní chuirfidh seo isteach ar do ghrádú creidmheasa
You can view a sample credit report (pdf) on the ICB's website
Tá sampla den chineál taifead creidmheasa (pdf) a bhíonn dhá choinneáil ag BCÉ anseo
Credit cards and credit history
Cártaí creidmheasa agus stair chreidmheasa

The ICB records credit card repayment performance on a monthly basis but, due to the nature of credit cards, you also get an additional 30 days before any negative information about your performance is recorded

Déanann BCÉ measúnú ar fheidhmíocht chártaí creidmheasa ar bhonn míosúil. Mar gheall ar a mbíonn i gceist le cártaí creidmheasa, gheobhaidh tú 30 lá breise sula ndéanfar taifeadadh ar eolas diúltach faoi do thaifead
Access to your records
Fáil ar do thaifead féin
Under the Data Protection Acts 1988 and 2003 (pdf), you are entitled to inspect your credit record
Faoi na hAchtanna um Chosaint Sonraí, 1988 agus 2003 (pdf), tá tú i dteideal scrúdú a dhéanamh ar do thaifead pearsanta féin
If the information stored about you is incorrect, you are entitled to have it amended and, in certain circumstances, you may also have the right to have it removed from your file
Má tá an t-eolas ar do thaifead míchruinn, tá sé de cheart agat é a leasú, agus i gcúinsí faoi leith é a bhaint amach as an dtaifead
If you wish to have inaccurate information on your credit record amended, contact the lender concerned and ask them to forward the correct information to the ICB
Más mian leat eolas míchruinn ar do thaifead creidmheasa a leasú, téigh i dteagmháil le d'iasachtóir agus iarr orthu an t-eolas cruinn a sheoladh chuig BCÉ
The ICB cannot change the information unless asked to do so by the relevant lender
Ní féidir le BCÉ an taifead a athrú ach amháin tar éis dóibh iarratas a fháil ó iasachtóir

If your request for access to your personal credit information is ignored or your request for a correction of inaccurate information is refused, you can complain to the Data Protection Commissioner, who has legal powers to ensure that your rights are protected

Muna bhfaigheann tú aon fhreagra ar iarratas breathnú ar do thaifead creidmheasa pearsanta, nó má dhiúltaítear duit eolas míchruinn a cheartú, is féidir leat gearán a chur chuig an Coimisinéir Cosanta Eolais, a bhfuil cumhachtaí dleathúla aige le cinntiú go ndéantar do chearta a chosaint
In addition, if you suffer damage through the mishandling of personal information held on computer, you may be entitled to claim compensation through the courts
Má dhéantar damáiste duit de bharr droch láimsheáil eolais phearsanta atá coinnithe fút ar ríomhaire d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh tú in ann éileamh ar chúiteamh a dhéanamh tríd na cúirteanna
Adding a personal declaration to your credit record
Dearbhú pearsanta a chur le do thaifead creidmheasa
It is possible to add a personal statement to your credit record to clarify it
Is féidir ráiteas pearsanta a chur le do thaifead creidmheasa chun é a shoiléiriú
For example, if you have incurred significant costs due to relationship breakdown, bereavement, illness or another cause, you may add these details to your record

Mar shampla, má tá costais shuntasacha tabhaithe agat (tar éis mar shampla briseadh caidrimh, méala, breoiteacht, timpiste, nó a leithéid) féadfaidh tú sonraí a chur le do thaifead creidmheasa á chur sin in iúl
The text of the note must be less than 200 words, must be relevant to matters contained in the record and must not be frivolous, vexatious or denigratory
Caithfidh téacs an nóta a bheith níos lú ná 200 focal agus a bheith ábhartha do chúrsaí atá sa taifead agus ní fhéadfaidh sé a bheith suaibhreosach, cráiteach nó lochtach
The ICB will attach this personal declaration to your file and it can be viewed when your data is accessed
Cuireann BCÉ an dearbhú pearsanta sin ansin ar do chomhad agus féadfar é a fheiceáil nuair a fhaightear rochtain ar do shonraí
However, lenders are not obliged to take your statement into account while checking your credit history when assessing you for a loan
Ach níl sé d’oibleagáid ar iasachtóirí do ráiteas a ghlacadh san áireamh agus iad ag athbhreithniú ar do stair chreidmheasa nuair atáthar do do mheas le haghaidh iasachta
How long is my credit history recorded for?
Cén t-achar a bheidh taifead ann de mo stair chreidmheasa?
The Irish Credit Bureau’s database will only hold information about you if you have had an active loan in the past 5 years and if your lender has provided information to the ICB
Ní choimeádfaidh bunachar sonraí BCÉ faisnéis fút ach má bhí iasacht ghníomhach agat le 5 bliana anuas agus má sholáthair d’iasachtóir faisnéis don BCÉ
All records remain on the database for 5 years once the loan has been closed, whether you repaid the debt or not

Fanann gach taifead ar bhunachar sonraí an BCÉ ar feadh 5 bliana chomh luath is a bheidh an cuntas tugtha chun críche, fiú má ndearna tú aisíocaíocht ar an bhfiacha nó má theip ort do chuid íocaíochtaí a dhéanamh
Can I get past bad credit details removed from my credit record?
An féidir liom droch-shonraí creidmheasa a bhí agam roimhe seo a ghlanadh ó mo thaifead creidmheasa?
Yes, but only if these details are incorrect
Is féidir, ach amháin má tá na sonraí seo mícheart
All lenders are obliged to provide an honest and truthful record of your credit agreements and transactions
Tá sé d’oibleagáid ar gach iasachtóir taifead fíor ionraic a thabhairt de do chuid comhaontuithe agus idirbhearta creidmheasa
This record will include details of bad debts or failures to repay
Cuirfear sonraí maidir le droch-fhiacha nó teip aisíocaíochta a dhéanamh sa thaifead seo

Note that, when you initially apply for a loan of any kind, you will have to sign a consent form, which states that you are aware that a record of your repayments on this loan will be kept and will form part of your credit history

Nuair a dhéanann tú iarratas ar iasacht d’aon chineál ar dtús, iarrtar ort foirm toilithe a shíniú a luann go dtuigeann tú go gcoinneofar stair de do chuid aisíocaíochtaí agus go mbeidh sí mar chuid de do stair chreidmheasa
You can get a copy of your credit record by applying online to the Irish Credit Bureau and paying €6
Is féidir cóip ded' thaifead creidmheasa a fháil trí iarratas a dhéanamh ar líne agus an táille de €6 a íoc
For security reasons, it will be posted out to you. It will not be emailed
(Tabhair ar aird go gcuirfear do thaifead creidmheasa sa phost chugat agus ní chuirfear i ríomhphost chugat é (ar chúiseanna slándála)
Alternatively, you can download a Personal Enquiry Form (pdf) or request an application form from the ICB
Nó féadfaidh tú Foirm Fhiosrúcháin Phearsanta (pdf) a íoslódáil agus a úsáid chun iarratas a dhéanamh sonraí a fháil faoi do thaifead creidmheasa
Send the completed application form with payment of €6 to the address below
Ní féidir ach aon chuardach amháin a dhéanamh in aghaidh an iarratais
Only 1 search can be conducted per application, and the ICB takes about 3 or 4 days to process each one
Tosaítear ag próiseáil an iarratais nuair a fhaigheann BCÉ d’fhoirm agus go hiondúil tógann sé thart ar 3 nó 4 lá an fhoirm a phróiseáil
The report that the ICB issues will display a unique reference number
Nuair a fhaigheann tú an tuairisc ó BCÉ, beidh uimhir thagartha shainiúil le feiceáil air
You may then contact the ICB to discuss your report, quoting this unique number
Féadfaidh tú dul i dteagmháil le BCÉ chun do thuairisc a phlé, ach ná déan dearmad d’uimhir shainiúil a lua
You cannot discuss your credit record with the ICB by phone until you have received the report
Is ag an gcéim seo amháin, a fhéadfaidh tú do thuairisc chreidmheasa a phlé le BCÉ ar an teileafón
